publicId.description: Required, the life account ID (i.e., the life account APPID) must be the current Mini Program and the account entity and the life account that has been associated.
publicId.description_zh: 必填，生活号 ID（即生活号 APPID），必须是当前小程序同账号主体且已关联的生活号。

memo.description: Copy. Support merchant customization, display up to one line.
memo.description_zh: 文案。支持商家自定义，最多展示一行。

onFollow.description: Execute when the user successfully follows the life account.
onFollow.description_zh: 当用户关注生活号成功后执行。
